definitions.definition: an advantage that only one person or group of people has, usually because of their position or because they are rich:
examples: Healthcare should be a right, not a privilege.

definitions.definition: an opportunity to do something special or enjoyable:
examples: I had the privilege of interviewing Picasso in the 1960s.

definitions.definition: the way in which rich people or people from a high social class have most of the advantages in society:
the special right that some people in authority have that allows them to do or say things that other people are not allowed to:
